Streaming: Watch & Stream Online via Paramount Plus appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
data.text:
Want to know where to watch Another 48 Hrs. online? We have all the streaming details right here. Another 48 Hrs. is an action comedy movie that was released on June 8, 1990. It is the sequel to the film 48 Hrs. and is directed by Walter Hill. The story centers around Jack Cates and Reggie Hammond and shows how they stop a dangerous drug dealer in San Francisco.

Here’s how you can watch and stream Another 48 Hrs. via streaming services such as Paramount Plus.

Is Another 48 Hrs. available to watch via streaming?

Yes, Another 48 Hrs. is available to watch via streaming on Paramount Plus.

Watch Another 48 Hrs. Right Here

In this movie, Jack Cates, a tough San Francisco police officer, faces big problems. He has an old debt to settle and could lose his job for good. So, he ass help from his former partner, Reggie Hammond, who just got out of jail after seven years. Before Reggie can enjoy his freedom, someone tries to kill him, pulling him and Jack into a dangerous situation.

The film stars Eddie Murphy as Reggie Hammond, Nick Nolte as Inspector Jack Cates, Brion James as Inspector Ben Kehoe / The Iceman, and Kevin Tighe as Lieutenant Blake Wilson.

Watch Another 48 Hrs. streaming via Paramount Plus

Another 48 Hrs. is available to watch on Paramount Plus. Paramount Plus is a well-known streaming service where users can watch a plethora of video content, such as Past Lives, Talk to Me, Men, Red Eye, and Mean Girls.

You can watch via the show Paramount Plus by following these steps:

Go to ParamountPlus.com

Select ‘Try It Free’

Choose your plan:

$5.99 per month or $59.99 per year (Essential)

$11.99 per month or $199.99 per year (with SHOWTIME)

Enter your personal information and create your account

The Paramount Plus Essential plan includes tens of thousands of episodes and movies, the NFL on CBS, the UEFA Champions League, 24/7 news coverage with CBS News, and limited ads.

Furthermore, the Paramount Plus with SHOWTIME plan includes all of the above, removes the ads except in limited circumstances, and also includes SHOWTIME originals, movies, and sports along with CBS live TV and college football. Nonetheless, you’re able to download shows to your mobile device.

The synopsis for Another 48 Hrs. is as follows:

“For the past four years, San Francisco cop Jack Cates has been after an unidentified drug kingpin who calls himself the Ice Man. Jack finds a picture that proves that the Ice Man has put a price on the head of Reggie Hammond, who is scheduled to be released from prison on the next day.“

NOTE: The streaming services listed above are subject to change. The information provided was correct at the time of writing.
